list_variables.description: A list of load balancer objects to associate with the cluster.
list_variables.name: LoadBalancers
list_variables.type: List of Amazon EC2 Container Service Service       LoadBalancers

variables.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that you want to run your                   service on. If you do not specify a cluster, Amazon ECS uses the default                   cluster.
variables.name: Cluster

variables.description: The number of simultaneous tasks, which you specify by using the                      TaskDefinition property, that you want to run on the                   cluster.
variables.name: DesiredCount

variables.description: The name or ARN of an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows your Amazon ECS container                   agent to make calls to your load balancer.
variables.name: Role
variables.required: Conditional. This parameter is required only if you specify the                      LoadBalancers property.

variables.description: The family, family and revision                      (family:revision), or ARN                   of the task definition that you want to run on the cluster.
variables.name: TaskDefinition
